creditline: Gift of Dr. Richard L. Simmons in honor of Lotus Stack
description: predominantly dark blue square panel with multicolored embroidery in the form of abstract shapes; panel has multicolored embroidered border; decorating three edges of panel is a multicolored fringe; edge without fringe has pocket opening; predominantly red striped fabric decorates back of panel; cloth loops found on two of panel's corners
title: Mirror cover (aynalik)
